levels.descriptor: The response is irrelevant, incorrect, or incomplete.
The response may lack information or evidence showing a lack of understanding of the text.
The response addresses some of the points. Evidence from the story supporting those points is present.
The response answers the question asked. Sufficient evidence from the story is used to support points the writer makes.
The response does not address the prompt at all.
The response shows a misreading of the text or question, or consistently wanders off topic.
The response shows a good understanding of the meaning of the text and question, though occasionally wanders off topic.
The response shows an excellent understanding of the meaning of the text and question, and stays on topic.
The response has severe language issues that make it incomprehensible.
The response has significant language errors that interfere with understanding.
The response has some language errors but they do not significantly interfere with understanding.
The response demonstrates strong command of language with few or no errors.
The response lacks any narrative structure or coherence.
The response has minimal narrative structure with poor coherence.
The response has adequate narrative structure with reasonable coherence.
The response has strong narrative structure with excellent coherence and flow.
